nodes.text: Kristin Baver is a journalist and associate editor for StarWars.com. In January 29, 2020, it was announced that Baver would be presenting a new weekly Star Wars current affairs show called This Week! in Star Wars, a spinoff of the weekly YouTube show The Star Wars Show. She is also the author of the books Skywalker: A Family at War, and Star Wars Year By Year: A Visual History, New Edition.
